description: Ability to use lesser invocations. Bene ﬁ t: You learn one ad- ditional invocation from the list available to you, choos- ing an invocation of one grade lower than the highest grade of invocation you know. For example, a 6th- level warlock could learn a least in- vocation, while a 16th-level warlock could learn any least, lesser, or greater invocation.
